changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS comment ( id BIGINT NOT NULL, is_deleted BOOL NOT NULL, text VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, question_id BIGINT, creator_id BIGINT, creation_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, deleting_time TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (id), FOREIGN KEY (creator_id) REFERENCES users(id), FOREIGN KEY (question_id) REFERENCES question(id) )
